channel.title: Recloring help
channel.description:
ok i have some questions about recolering in a client
i know how to recolor items
what i need: -where can i find the words use,drop,pickup,mine,...,examin all about items and objects,players -how i can make a purple dragon made from a black dragon -how i make a king purple dragon made of a KBD
grtz, kof

item.title: Recloring help
item.dc:creator: @KoF KoF
item.description:
@KoF wrote:

[quote=“x power x, post:2, topic:268500”]This isn’t in the client. Well the Purple Dragon is, but for the words Use, Drop , Pickup etc…

Go to the server and it will say the options.

CTRL+F = Search: Use[/quote]

i found a lot of the words in the client

i search in server for more???

Read full topic

item.title: Recloring help
item.dc:creator: @x_power_x x power x
item.description:
@x_power_x wrote:

This isn’t in the client. Well the Purple Dragon is, but for the words Use, Drop , Pickup etc…

Go to the server and it will say the options.

CTRL+F = Search: Use

Read full topic
